body.name: All-Clad Essentials Hard Anodized Nonstick Fry Pan Set 2 Piece, 8, 10,5 Inch Oven Broiler Safe 500F, Lid Safe 350F Pots and Pans, Cookware Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Set includes: 8.5 & 10.5-inch fry pans - kitchen staples featuring a flat base and flared, mid-sized sides that allow for easy flipping and tossing

PERFORMANCE FOR DELICIOUS, EVERYDAY COOKING, Essentials Nonstick heavy gauge aluminum delivers consistent, delicious cooking. The high-quality nonstick brings a long-lasting and easy release to cook with less fat.​

DESIGN YOU'LL LOVE with nonstick-safe nested design to stack and save space, a permanently secured comfort grip ensured by the double riveted stainless steel handles, and an easy size identification thanks to capacity markings

VERSATILE & EASY CARE-Essentials Nonstick is oven safe up to 500°F and compatible with any stovetop except induction.The glass lids are oven safe up to 350°F.To preserve the nonstick quality over time, hand wash your cookware.Limited Lifetime Warranty.​
DESIGNED IN CANONSBURG, PA – USA, Made In China.
body.description: If you have something to fry, whether it’s a big catfish filet or small diced potatoes, this classic kitchen staple is the cookware to help you do it. Ideal for cooking at high heat, flipping, and tossing foods is a snap, thanks to the flat base and flared sides. As part of our Essentials Nonstick Collection, this Fry Pan Set is engineered with 3 layers of our high-performing, nonstick coating, which keeps food molecules from clinging to the surface, making it perfect for cooking sticky or delicate foods. Constructed of hard-anodized aluminum, it’s highly durable. The 8.5-inch pan is great for when you need to whip up small, quick bites and the 10.5-inch will come in handy when you need to cook a quick breakfast in the morning or delicious dinner for two in the evening. Once you’re done eating, simply give it a quick hand washing to wrap up the easiest cooking experience you’ve ever had.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Makes cooking easier Put cooking on easy mode with three layers of slick, nonstick coating that makes food slide right off without having to constantly stir or use a lot of fats and oil. PTFE nonstick coating The Essentials Collection is made with a PTFE nonstick coating that won’t degrade or flake off into your plate. Compatible with most cooktops Essentials Nonstick Cookware works with gas and electric ranges to give you the ultimate versatility. You can even put it in the oven or broiler (up to 500°F). Easy to clean Essentials is dishwasher-safe but we recommend you hand wash to preserve the nonstick performance. And due to the superior nonstick coating, clean-up is very minimal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never look back.
reviews.reviewText: I got this pan set a few months ago for a screaming Black Friday deal, and they're my favorite pans I've owned thus far. Two classic sizes, one great for solo cooking and the other for two. Good heat distribution, and eggs slide right off with barely any oil. Super easy to clean. Surface holding up well with wooden/bamboo and plastic implements. I love the weight, just enough to sit well on the stove and be taken seriously without straining my wrists. The weight of the pan itself balances nicely with the weight of the handle, no teeter tottering. The sturdy handle attachment design makes me doubt that there will ever be an undesirable angle in this equation. Great value for the price, I'll be hard-pressed to buy anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I've only used them a few times, so I can't speak to durability, but so far, exactly as advertised.They clean easily, are truly non-stick, and hard anodized is one of the safest nonstick coatings you can get (from what I've read).They are solid, medium to heavy, which I like. Handles never got hot for me, but I only cooked things for less than 10 mins, so far. Will update after cooking larger, more time consuming meals.Made pancakes, eggs, grilled cheese, which all came out great.Next up is stir fry.They should last for years if you properly take care of them. Most people sadly don't know how to treat non-stick coatings, and crank the heat up too high, let the pans sit empty on heat, stack them without padding in between, use metal utensils, all no-no's with any non-stick coated pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pro- chef Quality
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty,great non stick,works as advertised,easy clean up.Now let’s see how long the non stick works,too soon to know,check with me in 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, easy to clean, good heat distribution
reviews.reviewText: Durable, easy to clean, good heat distribution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great strong pans to use every day.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Overall I really love these pants they’re heavy duty they clean excellent and they cook really good and are very nonstick. That being said I do need to mention that what is happening with the pans after I’ve had them about six months now is what other customers complain about is the pans are with time warping . And what happens as you can see in the video I provided is things don’t stay level so there’s hotspots and not so hotspots on the pan. It’s something that I’ve adjusted to. I still think they’re great pans otherwise for the price. I’m just not willing to pay three times as more for pants I don’t warp and my hands can’t handle an iron skillet so this is the best I can get. They came to in a set I use them every day and I really do love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: Searched long and hard for quality nonstick pans. Took a chance with these because of the brand, and the price. The price does not reflect the quality. These are heavy, and heavy duty. Just what you would look for in quality pans. I can finally cook eggs without worry about cleaning the pan afterward. Look forward to purchasing more pots and pans from All-Clad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pans are perfect for everyday cooking with easy cleanup! I do have the stainless steel All Clad set as well but I needed something for quick cooking. This was everything I could ask for in a non stick pan and it’s durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used these same skillets in a chef’s home and loved their easy clean up, long lasting nonstick coating, and even heat distribution. I took a chance on buying a used set of 3 skillets, and could not find any damage or cosmetic injuries. The pans are heavy, which is expected, but having two handles makes them easy for me to manage. I hope to find more deals and expand my All-clad collection.

Estos sartenes son de lo mejor que eh comprado. Regularmente los que sielen vender en los super y de marcas comerciales funcionan para un rato pero no duran lo mismo que este tipo de sarten. Se siente la calidad del material y son muy duraderos.
Great product and it does not stick.
Absolutely love them! They work great and are so easy to clean!!! 😁😁
Great for frying fishes as it won’t stick and easy to clean.

Bought a non-stick pan at twice the price at a local dept. store. Luckily it had a scratch and needed to be returned. Looked around and found these at half the price and were 2 for 1!!! Score! My husband is a chef and is impressed. Pay attention to cleaning instructions (no scratching allowed) and no using metal cooking utensils on them. All Clad has been around forever and is known for being great quality so these should last a long time.
